title: Conducting and insulating sphere charge location

content.question: A small amount of charge is placed on both an isolated conducting sphere and an isolated insulating sphere. For both spheres, the charge is added at a small area at the top of the sphere. After a few seconds, where on each of the spheres is the charge that was added?

choices.label: Conducting Insulating At the top At the top
Conducting Insulating At the top Spread over the surface
Conducting Insulating Spread over the surface At the top
Conducting Insulating Spread over the surface Spread over the surface

content.answer: Conducting Insulating Spread over the surface At the top

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
